editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: Six Images of Raguel, መልክአ፡ ራጉኤል፡, Asmat Prayers of the Seven Archangels, ድርሳን፡ ዘሰባቱ፡ ሊቃነ፡ መላእክት፡, Image and of John, Son of Thunder, መልክአ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ወልደ፡ ነጐድጓድ፡ combined with Asmat Prayer, and Image of the Guardian Angel, መልክአ፡ ዐቃቤ፡ መልአክ፡

msItem.title: Six Images of Saint Raguel, Mälk‘a Ragu’el, መልክአ፡ ራጉኤል፡
First Image of Raguel, for Monday
msItem.incipit: ሰላም ፡ ለአብ ፡ ገባሬ ፡ ኵሉ ፡ ፍጥረት ፡ ለወልድ ፡ ሰላም ፡ ለባሴ ፡ ትስብእት ፡ ወለመንፈስ ፡ ቅዱስ ሰላም ፡ ወሀቤ ፡ ፯ቱ ፡ ሀብታት ፡ እንዘ ፡ ፫ቱ ፡ አካላት ፡ ወ፩ ፡ መለኮት ፡ እምሐፅ ፡ ዘይሠርር ፡ በመዓልት ፡ ወእምግብር ፡ ዘየሐውር ፡ በጽልመት ፡ በእደ ፡ ቅዱስ ፡ ራጉኤል ፡ መልአከ ፡ ምሕረት ፡ ዕቀቡኒ ፡ በኵሉ ፡ ጊዜ ፡ ,በኩሉ ፡ ሰዓት ፡ በስመ ፡ እግዚአብሔር ፡ ሥሉስ ፡ በኀበ ፡ ኵሉ ፡ ውዱስ ፡ ናሁ ፡ ወጠንኩ ፡ ድርሳነ ፡ ራጉኤል ፡ ርኡስ ፡ ተወከፍ ፡ ወትረ ፡ ጸሎትየ ፡ ከመ ፡ ጺና ፡ ዕጣን ፡ ቅዱስ ፡ ዘተወከፍኮ ፡ ለዳዊት ፡ ንጉሥ ፡

msItem.title: Second Image of Raguel, for Tuesday
msItem.incipit: እዌጥን ፡ አንሰ ፡ ዝክረ ፡ መልክዓቲከ ፡ በአስተሐምሞ ፡ አኮ ፡ ንስቲተ ፡ ለወድሶ ፡ ዳዕሙ ፡ ለፈጽሞ ፡ ራጉኤል ፡ መልአክ ፡ ቅቡዓ ፡ ቅዳሴ ፡ ዓበሞ ፡ አስተበቍዓከ ፡ ተሀበኒ ፡ መና ፡ ሰማያት ፡ ለጥዕሞ ፡ ከመ ፡ ዘይስእል ፡ ወልድ ፡ አባሁ ፡ ወእሞ ፡
እጼውዕ ፡ ስመከ ፡ ወእኢምኃከ ፡ በተድላ ፡ ራጉኤል ፡ መልአክ ፡ ለዓለም ፡ መስተበቅላ ፡ እለ ፡ ያንኰረኵሩ ፡ ዘልፈ ፡ ለጠፈረ ፡ ሰማይ ፡ በማዕከላ ፡ ድኅረ ፡ ኃለፈ ፡ መዓልት ፡ ለጽልመተ ፡ ሌሊት ፡ በክፍላ ፡ በሥልጣነ ፡ ቃልከ ፡ ይትኤዘዙ ፡ ከዋክብት ፡ ወዕብላ ፡
msItem.note: Third Image of Raguel and Asmat Prayer (), for Wednesday

msItem.title: Fourth Image of Raguel, for Thursday
msItem.incipit: ሰላም ፡ ለዝክረ ፡ ስምከ ፡ ዝክረ ፡ ስመ ፡ አብ ፡ ኅብዕት ፡ ወሞገሰ ፡ ኄራን ፡ ነገሥት ፡ ራጉኤል ፡ መልአክ ፡ ወሀቤ ፡ ፯ቱ ፡ ሀብታት ፡ ጸግወኒ ፡ ስመ ፡ ዘአስተብርኮ ፡ ወስመ ፡ ኬንያ ፡ ኤላት ፡ እስመ ፡ በኅቡዕ ፡ ስምከ ፡ ይትነሣእ ፡ ምውት፡

msItem.title: Fifth Image of Raguel, for Friday
msItem.incipit: ሰላም ፡ ለዝክረ ፡ ስምከ ፡ ወለሥዕርትከ ፡ ኤጤሜሶር ፡ ምስለ ፡ ርእስከ ፡ ግልድምያሶር ፡ መፍትሔ ፡ ሀብታት ፡ ራጉኤል ፡ ፍልድምያሶር ፡ በእንተ ፡ ኅቡዕ ፡ ስሙ ፡ ለእግዚአብሔር ፡ ተሀበኒ ፡ ነዓ ፡ ሀብታተ ፡ ሰማይ ፡ ወምድር ፡

msItem.title: Sixth Image of Raguel, for Saturday
msItem.incipit: ሰላም ፡ ለዝክረ ፡ ስምከ ፡ እምሀሊበ ፡ ዕጐልት ፡ ጥዑም ፡ ዓዲ ፡ እምወይን ፡ ዘውስተ ፡ ኤዶም ፡ ራጉኤል ፡ ክንፍከ ፡ ዘተሴረየ ፡ በደም ፡ ሤመከ ፡ ወአልዓልከ ፡ እግዚአ ፡ መላእክት ፡ አፍሐም ፡ መድኃኒተ ፡ ትኩን ፡ ለኵሉ ፡ ዓለም፡

msItem.title: Asmat Prayers of the Seven Archangels, Dǝrsanä Zäsäbatu Liqǝnä Mäla’kǝt, ድርሳን፡ ዘሰባቱ፡ ሊቃነ፡ መላእክት፡
Asmat Prayer of the Archangel Michael
Asmat Prayer of the Archangel Gabriel
Asmat Prayer of the Archangel Rufael
Asmat Prayer of the Archangel Raguel
Asmat Prayer of the Archangel Saquel
Asmat Prayer of the Archangel Fanuel
Asmat Prayer of the Archangel Afnin
Image of John, Son of Thunder, Mälk‘a Yoḥannǝs Wäldä Nägwädǝgwad, መልክአ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ወልደ፡ ነጐድጓድ፡
Asmat Prayer on John 1:1–4 as protection against demons and evil people and sorcerers
Image of John, Son of Thunder, Mälk‘a Yoḥannǝs Wäldä Nägwädǝgwad, መልክአ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ወልደ፡ ነጐድጓድ፡
msItem.incipit: በስመ ፡ አብ ፡ ወወልድ ፡ ጸሎት ፡ በእንተ ፡ መግረሬ ፡ ፀር ፡ ወመፍትሔ ፡ ሀብት ፡ ዘነገሮ ፡ እግዚአብሔር ፡ ለዮሐንስ ፡ ወልደ ፡ ነጐድጓድ ፡ እንዘ ፡ ሀሎ ፡ በገነት ፡ ከመ ፡ ይዕቀብ ፡ ሥጋሃ ፡ ለእግዝእትነ ፡ ማርያም ፡ ወላዲተ ፡ አምላክ ፡ እንዘ ፡ ይብል ፡ ያሮክ ፡ ያሮክ ፡ ያሮክ ፡ ከምላድ ፡ ከላዩድ ፡ ህልክናድ ፡ ሲምኑድ ፡ በቃለ ፡ እሉ ፡ አስማት ፡ ሀበኒ ፡ ሀብተ ፡ ወሢመተ ፡
msItem.note: combined with the first line from six of the sections of Psalm 118 (each of which begins with a successive Hebrew letter): mem, gimal, zyin samech, vav, and taph and are combined with an asmat prayer as protection from an enemy and for gaining wealth
Five Psalms from the Book of Psalms

msItem.incipit: በስመ ፡ አብ ፡ ወወልድ ፡ ወመንፈስ ፡ ቅዱስ ፡ ፩ ፡ አምላክ ፡ ሠራዒ ፡ ሥነ ፡ ሠርጐ ፡ ሰማይ ፡ ወምድር ፡ ወስእለተ ፡ ኵሉ ፡ ሰማዒ ፡ መልአከ ፡ ዑቃቤ ፡ ዘትሬኢ ፡ ወዘኢታስተርኢ ፡ ይትመላህ ፡ ቅድመ ፡ ገጽየ ፡ ሰይፈ ፡ እዴከ ፡ በላዒ ፡ ዘንተ ፡ ርእዮ ፡ ለይኅፈር ፡ ጸላዒ ፡

handNote.desc: The words Raguel and Mary are rubricated

decoNote.desc: surrounded by the Four Living Creatures
and Solomon, based on the text of the image
The four heads of Qerubim, based on the text of the image
Unknown (a winged creature standing between two plants with red flowers)
Four serpents. Prayer “Save me and protect me from the evil ones whose mouth is like the serpent. . . .”
Box with X-shape creating four triangular spaces, each with a asmat prayer, e.g., “Put fear inside the heart of my enemies. . . “ (top)

Lamb holding with caption (reading from inside to outside): “Behold, the Lamb of God who takes away the sin of the world, Alpha and O[mega], Beta, Iota, Ahǝya òärahya, Jesus Christ, son of God, Victor and Son of Mary, the Virgin, protect me suffering and perdition, your servant, Ḫaylä Maryam.”
Box with X-shape creating four triangular spaces, each with a asmat prayer, e.g., “Look upon my prayer for your servant” (top); “Rebuke my enemies and adversaries” (bottom)
Two Serpents. Asmat prayer written in a circular flow in the center (from the inside): “Give me deliverance from spear and sword. . . .”

Four Serpents: Asmat prayer written in a circular flow in the center (from the inside): “Save me and protect me from the hand of the children of aliens who prepare their mouths as the mouths of serpents. They stretch their bow to do harm.”

Four s in the corners around a box with an X shape. Four texts are at top, bottom, right and left, e.g., bottom: “Rebuke my enemies and adversaries. With this asmat, protect me, your servant Ḫaylä Maryam.”
The , here called “steward of lights,” with wings outstretched, holding sun and moon
The , with wings outstretched
The , with wings outstretched
The , with wings outstretched
The Saquel, with wings outstretched
The , with wings outstretched
The Afnin, with wings outstretched

with caption “Mary, daughter of Hanna and Joakim, rainbow of Patriarch Shem, intercede for your beloved son, Savior of the World. May He visit me from heaven. Your servant and sinner, Ḫaylä Maryam. Amen.”
John, Son of Thunder
with caption (l. to r.): “He said to his mother, ‘behold, your son.’” “He said to his disciple, ‘behold, your mother.’”
and Saint John. With caption “How Saint Yarәd, the Singer, praised Saint John, the Evangelist.”

item.desc: The arrangement of the codex for reading extends beyond the reading of the ; Sunday (40r), daily (52v)

Several of the aspects of codicology (leather work, materials, two-toned head band and tail band, and especially the ḫarägs, suggest that this manuscript was produced in or around the Government Scriptorium. At the same time, the use of particle board for the cover boards is interesting
(etc.) words of text are written interlinearly
